description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cka44","text":"This is the protocol for cytotoxicity assay in cancer cell lines using flow cytometry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: cytotoxicity assay, cancer cell lines, flow cytometry
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"cbg1h","text":"1. Tumor cell line ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4dcq","text":"2. Tumor-reactive T cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3t7o3","text":"3. Tumor cell medium: RPMI 1640 (Gibco 11875) + 10% Fetal Bovine Serum (FBS) complete mixture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"39p3f","text":"4. T cell medium: 50ml complete MEM media (Gibco 11095080) +  500 IU/ml IL2 + add 50 µL of\n1000X beta-mercaptoethanol (55mM)       \n5. 1X Phosphate-buffered saline (PBS)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbe24","text":"6. FACS Buffer: 2% FBS in PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sv02","text":"7. APC-conjugated rabbit anti-active caspase 3 Ab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs1ai","text":"8. BD Cytofix/Cytoperm‱ Fixation/Permeabilization Kit ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f4sii","text":"9. Fixation/permeabilization solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9nut","text":"10.BD Perm/Wash‱ Buffer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"720D651FD66E11EEBBE90A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"720D651FD66E11EEBBE90A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8qdjl","text":"Begin T cell culturing a week prior. Grow and culture tumor cell lines. Ensure the cells are not over-confluent. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52sv3","text":"Split the tumor cells the day before the assay. Perform the cytotoxic assay as described in next steps.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fakq5","text":"Count tumor cells. Collect 3-5M cells for each cell line. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"209j7","text":"Centrifuge the cells and wash the pellet once with PBS. Ensure that all media is washed off as this can inhibit the staining. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cascq","text":"Aspirate the supernatant and leave as little PBS as possible ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fb3v","text":"Re-suspend cells in culture medium at the appropriate ratio for the experiment (1X106 / ml for 50,000\ncells/50ul/well or about ~80% confluent) using 96 well round well plate with 50,000 cell tumor and in triplication.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":84,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b23fk","text":"Add 50 ul of T cell suspension diluted to achieve the desired E:T ratio. Below is an example of how to set up E:T ratios:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a21o9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"76dsf","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gkc5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["98","151","167"],"data":[["  ET Ratio(s)
  ","  T cells/50ul /well
  ","  Tumor cells/50ul/well
  "],["  0:1
  ","  0 (only with T cell medium)","  5 x104 cells"],["  1:1
  ","  5 x104 cells","  5 x104 cells"],["  3:1
  ","  1.5x105 cells
  ","  5 x104 cells
  "]],"guid":"C4CF64EF4B7748A4A9B9196876CF2682","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["  ET Ratio(s)
  ","  T cells/50ul /well
  ","  Tumor cells/50ul/well
  "],["  0:1
  ","  0 (only with T cell medium)","  5 x104 cells"],["  1:1
  ","  5 x104 cells","  5 x104 cells"],["  3:1
  ","  1.5x105 cells
  ","  5 x104 cells
  "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75h5","text":"Centrifuge the mixed cells in the tubes at 300 rpm for 5 minutes to gently pellet the cells. Incubate for 3 hours at 370C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":119,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hgg0","text":"Add 150ul PBS into the plate and then centrifuge at 2000rpm for 5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qj7b","text":"Remove the supernatant and add then 100ul/well Trypsin. The plate is incubated at 37C incubator for 3-5mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5rsq","text":"Add 100ul FACS buffer to stop the trypsinization and centrifuge at 2000rpm for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ti1d","text":"Fix and permeabilize cells using Cytofix/CytopermTM Kit (BD BioSciences) for 20 minutes at room temperature (100ul/well – mix well).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":49,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":122,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9i8vm","text":"Wash with Perm/WashTM Buffer (150ul/well) at 2000 rpm for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":19,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"at3b","text":"Prepare caspase antibody dilution such that each well gets stained with 2.5ul of APC-conjugated rabbit anti-active caspase 3 Ab in 50 ul Perm/WashTM Buffer. Mix gently and incubate for 30 min in the dark on ice or in the 4°C refrigerator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":146,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dk91","text":"Resuspend the cell pallets into 100ul FACS buffer (2% FBS in 1X PBS). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Cytotoxicity Assay Protocol
